## Initial setup

Publish the project to Quarto Pub interactively by typing

```sh
export QUARTO_PUB_AUTH_TOKEN=TOKEN_HERE
quarto publish
```

Save the generated `_publish.yml`. Once the `_publish.yml` is generated, the succeeding builds will be handled by GitHub actions.

## Wiki

This website contains resources related to the R [@RCoreTeam-2023] package [manCULTA](https://github.com/sigmaresearch100/manCULTA) outside the [pkgdown](https://sigmaresearch100.github.io/manCULTA) documentation.
